How to Start an OnlyFans without Followers & Fame –
6 Tips for Success

Estimated Reading Time: 4 min 25 sec

Even the most famous and highest-earning creators on OnlyFans started from scratch. They probably had no fame or followings, just like you.

If you’re asking yourself, can I make it on OnlyFans without a follower or fan base?’ Sit tight and read through to the end.

While you may not rise to fame in an instant, we want to help you grow your followings and become one of the best OnlyFans content creators of your time.

So, let’s delve in and explore ways to get you started without followers or fame on OnlyFans.

Keep reading!

Make an appointment now

Starting an OnlyFans as a Beginner

Setting up an OnlyFans can be challenging, especially if you don’t have the proper knowledge and strategies.

If you take a deeper peek into successful creators’ stories, you’ll understand how much effort they put into their work.

Success comes when you’re willing to:

  • Set clear goals and focus on achieving them
  • Follow our tips for success

Setting Clear Goals for OnlyFans

A proper plan and clear goals are vital in ensuring your OnlyFans success.

What do you want to achieve? A large following? Fame? Money? Or all of the above?

How do you plan to achieve those Goals? How much content will you manage to generate every week, and what are your expectations?

Do you have a plan for the right places to promote your content?

What are your projections for the first month on your active OnlyFans account? This includes the number of followers and subscribers.

These are just a few questions you should ask yourself.

Your preparedness and commitment to growth are what will drive your success.The key here is to have precise goals to guide you. You can set weekly, bi weekly, or monthly goals based on your expectations.

Starting an OnlyFans is about setting the stage for your fans and followers and ensuring you deliver on your promises.

That being said, let’s delve into the tips for generating a large following (and money, too) for your OnlyFans account.

Tips for Generating a Large Following and Fame for Your OnlyFans Account

#1. Create a compelling Profile

A compelling OnlyFans Profile is vital to your success.

Your profile introduces you to prospective fans and followers.

While it can set you apart from your competitors, it also allows you to catch your audience’s attention.

A beautifully curated profile speaks volumes about you. So, make the most of it by including all the necessary details to create a first impression.

But how do you achieve this?

  • Start by showcasing your expertise and experience in the best light. Use each part of your OnlyFans profile to build your strengths and connect with people.
  • Add your best profile picture.

Your prospective followers need to feel connected to you; your picture can tell a lot about you.

Make it professional and reflective of your style, tone, and niche.

  • Create an engaging introduction video to get people interested in your offerings.

Your profile has to be original and unique. It is about your followers and how you can help them meet their needs.

#2. Identify Your Niche

OnlyFans is a mainstream site with many creators competing for the audiences attention.

It wouldn’t harm to check out your competitors. You’d want to know who you’re up against, what they’ve done to rise to the top, the networks they use to promote content, engagement levels, and the niches they prefer.

This will help you identify untapped niches to focus on and strategize adequately to ensure no gaps are left unfilled.

A unique niche sets you apart. Not only will you create brand awareness, but you’ll also significantly build your credibility and loyalty.

It helps to nurture valuable relationships as you focus on quality connections.

The tone, style, and consistency of your content and interactions will boost your branding and loyal followings.

Make an appointment now

#3. Make Your Account Accessible

Setting up an OnlyFans account may be a no-brainer. But does that guarantee a loyal following?

To get people streaming into your account, you need to make it accessible.

Since you’re just starting out, let people sign up, subscribe for free, or offer a free trial for a month. You can also offer them a signup bonus or a discount on a subscription to get them on board.

This will entice them to view your content; if they like it, they’ll stay.

The key here is to build a thriving community of fans who actively like and engage with your content.

Ultimately, you’ll have a fan base of ambassadors who share your content with all their networks and ultimately increase your revenue.

#4. Give People a Reason to Follow You

People go online to search for fresh content relevant to their needs.

What are you offering to entice them to subscribe to you? What value are you adding to their lives?

You need to give your prospects a good reason to connect with you on OnlyFans.

Consider why people use OnlyFans, then plan to curate and share content that resonates with them consistently.

Strategically use your OnlyFans account to share trending topics, tell compelling stories and provide real-time alerts.

#5. Plan Your Content Well

To ensure tailored content, monitor trending conversations relevant to your niche.

Find out the thought leaders who impact such conversations. It will help you establish your brand voice and tone. All your future talks, posts, designs, launches, and responses will reflect your brand voice.

Make your subscribers and followers heroes in your stories. Ensure you write content from their point of view. They’ll come to understand how much value you can give and the benefits they get from your content.

Quality content will give you a leg up over your competition, especially when you are just entering the OnlyFans realm.

Investing in quality tools and equipment is vital as it will save you time and effort during content creation.

Curating top-notch content for your fans isn’t enough, though. The content needs to be well planned and scheduled. Be organized and consistent with your content. Set a schedule that will allow you to post content several times every week. This will compel people to visit your account more often. Eventually, you’ll be able to retain loyal subscribers.

Every minute or hour you put into ensuring quality, consistent content on OnlyFans is worth it. The results are much more rewarding.

Include visuals in your content, such as graphics, images, audio, and video.

Visually enhanced content generates more views, likes, and shares. It will help you scale up quickly.

Videos and live streams are the most engaging. Upload them directly to OnlyFans so they autoplay while scrolling through content and grab everyone’s attention.

#6. Get Your Content Out There

Once you’ve established your OnlyFans account, promoting your content will be easier.

There are plenty of ways to get your content out there. 

You can cross-promote to your social media accounts, online store, website, or blog.

There’s also an option to promote your account using top-notch agencies like Fandafia Agency, whose sole objective is to help you thrive.

Using your OnlyFans account to share your behind-the-scenes posts on other channels will help to funnel more followers to OnlyFans.

This will bring in more signups and improve the platform’s performance.

Let’s understand the various avenues of content promotion.

Simple and Effective Ways of Promoting Your OnlyFans Account

1. Cross-Collaboration

Cross-collaborating with various OnlyFans creators is a surefire way of getting known to prospective followers.

  • Create content with other creators through photosets and live streams.

It’s the most effective, fun way to reach prospects and establish yourself and your brand.

  • Encourage Followers to Tag Others

Encouraging your followers to tag their friends and acquaintances on posts is an effective content promotion strategy.

When you post inspiring content, urge them to tag people they know can benefit from the post.

Ideally, more people will be drawn to your content and decide to join the other followers.

Do this occasionally when it makes sense. Don´t overdo it, as it may appear spammy.

2. Link to All Your Platforms

Another effective way to grow your OnlyFans followers is by creating awareness on your active platforms. 

Do you have a Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube account? Don’t hesitate to share your OnlyFans link there. 

Convert some of your Live streams and webinars into YouTube videos and share the links on social media.

Embed your videos on your website or LinkedIn account or create blog posts and link them to your networks.

Doing this will help you build a diverse network of followers and lure in new followers and fans. 

This will, in turn, generate more leads and sales.

3. Encourage Likes

Encouraging likes is one of the things that will give you broad exposure on OnlyFans. While starting out small, make sure you get your followers to like your posts.

You can use this as a call to action. For instance, tell them to ‘like this if… Start by liking your own posts to encourage them.

More likes from your subscribers and followers on OnlyFans means more social proof.

It all translates into your big success on the platform.

Make an appointment now

4. Use Hashtags

If you want to boost your social followers, use hashtags. Here’s how:

Utilize popular hashtags: Ensure to use the hashtags strategically and in moderation. For example, you can use one popular Tag per Post.

Find relevant hashtags from sites like Hashtagify.me or Hashtags.org.

Be part of current events and trending topics: Look for Industry trends regularly to know what is happening. This will guide you on a relevant topic to present to your readers.

If you think it will interest your followers, share it with a hashtag.

For instance, you can share an inspiring story or quote on a Monday using the trending hashtag #MondayMotivation.

Those looking for this hashtag may land on your post and follow you.

5. Ask Your Followers for Tips

Every time you post content on OnlyFans, ask for tips from the audience. 

Suggest these tips whenever you share a video or image. Let it be a call to action.

If it is a live stream, ask them for tips. This is an excellent way of maximizing your engagement and earning potential on OnlyFans.

Another way is to pin a tip menu on your OnlyFans profile so that if a follower tips a certain amount of money that appears on your menu, they get gifted with the item. 

This method is specifically practical if you sell different digital and physical products.

6. Actively Engage Your Followers

Being proactive on OnlyFans has a lot of benefits.

Actively engage your followers by listening and responding to their comments. Always answer their questions on time. You’ll increase your presence and develop meaningful relationships with the people. 

Know that your fans expect your response when they pose a comment or question. It’s vital to provide an immersive experience to users by being exceptional with your responses. 

Be a good listener and an active participant, tending to their pain points accordingly.

Publicly recognize and appreciate those active in liking, reposting, and commenting on your posts. 

Making them feel acknowledged and heard will likely turn them into loyal fans and brand ambassadors.

7. Increase User Interaction Using Humor

Sharing funny photos and memes on your page can generate engagement and make your content go viral.

This humanizes your brand and allows more people to relate to your content. You must ensure that your memes make sense and resonate with your brand voice.

8. Use Inspirational Quotes

Inspirational quotes can be insightful to your audience. 

Although they’re hard to create, you don’t need to struggle to provide original quotes. 

There are many inspirational quotes from people like Alexander the Great, Walt Whitman, Duchess Meghan, and more. Those that inspire you may as well inspire your audience.

Quotes are excellent conversation starters and provide high engagement and interaction levels.

9. Engage Influencers

An industry influencer can help promote your OnlyFans and give you the needed exposure. If you have a close connection with one of the influencers, collaborate with them on some of your content.

This is a great way to offer fresh, real-time content to the audience. You’ll also be able to bring in some of their followers.

Plan content ahead of time to be sure they’ll get the right message across. However, you should allow them the flexibility to present it in their own way.

Working with an influencer helps to promote your OnlyFans with significant levels of exposure.

Make an appointment now

10. Follow Other OnlyFans Creators

Following other users allows you to gain more followers. This strategy is very effective, especially when you’re just starting out.

Tap into new OnlyFans creators like yourself. Follow them and even message them.

Since they’re also looking for followers, they’ll likely follow you back or subscribe to you.

About 20% of the creators you follow on OnlyFans will respond by subscribing back. The best thing about all this is that you can mass message them and even sell them your PPV content.

11. Utilize the Services of an Agency

Engaging an Agency to promote your OnlyFans account is an option that guarantees success.

There are result-oriented companies like Fandafia Agency that guarantee massive following and subscriptions with overwhelming returns.

They have proficient Management Teams that audit your OnlyFans account and provide effective strategies that drive growth. You’ll be advised on the best content to produce for better returns.

The Agency will manage your account diligently to ensure your content is impactful and generates maximum revenue.

Wrapping Up

There’s plenty of unpackaging to do in order to add value to your OnlyFans followers.

It’s essential to form a strategy that will ensure you engage your audience. This will help you stand out and go viral authentically. 

With time, you’ll see your OnlyFans account grow from zero followers to thousands of loyal subscribers.

All it requires is patience. 

Once you implement each tip listed here, it will not be long before your growth takes an upward turn. Only then will you check your analytics and make adjustments as needed.
